level.heading: Schedule V tests.
level.text: The Mayor shall place a substance in Schedule V if the Mayor finds that:
The substance has low potential for abuse relative to the controlled substances listed in Schedule IV;
The substance has currently accepted medical use in treatment in the United States or the District of Columbia; and
The substance has limited physical dependence or psychological dependence liability relative to the controlled substances listed in Schedule IV.

level.heading: Legislative History of Laws
level.text: For legislative history of D.C. Law 4-29, see Historical and Statutory Notes following ยง 48-901.02.
